source:
%%sql

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.hr_record_fact (

    HRRecordID,
    EmployeeID,
    PersonnelAreaID,
    PersonnelSubAreaID,
    OrganisationalUnitID,
    ContractID,
    PayBandID,
    CostCenterID,
    PositionID,
    ManagerEmployeeID,
    ManagerPositionID,
    CounterSignManagerEmployeeID,
    LocationID,
    WorkScheduleID,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive)

SELECT
    Row_Number() over (order by T2.EmployeeID) as HRRecordID,
    T2.EmployeeID AS EmployeeID,
    T3.PersonnelAreaID AS PersonnelAreaID,
    T4.PersonnelSubAreaID AS PersonnelSubAreaID,
    T5.OrganisationUnitID AS OrganisationalUnitID,
    T6.ContractID AS ContractID,
    T7.PayBandID AS PayBandID, -- NULLS occur due to contractors
    T8.CostCenterID AS CostCenterID,
    T9.PositionID AS PositionID,
    T10.ManagerEmployeeID AS ManagerEmployeeID,
    TempMPID.PositionID AS ManagerPositionID,
    NULL AS CounterSignManagerEmployeeID,
    T11.LocationID AS LocationID,
    T12.WorkScheduleID AS WorkScheduleID,
    T14.SourceSystemID,
    current_timestamp as StartDate,
    NULL as EndDate,
    current_timestamp as IngestionDate,
    NULL as ValidTo,
    md5(concat(T2.EmployeeID, IFNULL(T3.PersonnelAreaID, '.'), IFNULL(T4.PersonnelSubAreaID, '.'), IFNULL(T5.OrganisationUnitID, '.'),IFNULL(T6.ContractID, '.'),
                IFNULL(T7.PayBandID, '.'),IFNULL(T8.CostCenterID, '.'),IFNULL(T9.PositionID, '.'),IFNULL(T10.ManagerEmployeeID, '.'),IFNULL(TempMPID.PositionID, '.'),
                IFNULL(T10.CounterSignManagerID, '.'), IFNULL(T11.LocationID, '.'),IFNULL(T12.WorkScheduleID, '.'))) as RowID, 
    'Y' as IsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr_historic T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.employee_dim T2 ON T1.Pers_No = T2.EmployeeNumber AND T2.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.personnelarea_dim T3 ON T1.PA = T3.PersonnelAreaCode AND T3.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.personnelsubarea_dim T4 ON T1.PSubArea = T4.PersonnelSubAreaCode AND T4.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.organisationunit_dim T5 ON T1.Org_unit = T5.OrganisationUnit AND T5.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.contract_dim T6 ON T1.WorkC = T6.ContractCode AND 
                                                CASE 
                                                        WHEN T1.CT IS NULL
                                                        THEN 'N/A'
                                                        ELSE T1.CT
                                                END = T6.ContractTypeCode AND T6.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.payband_dim T7 ON T1.PS_group = T7.PSGroupCode AND T7.IsActive = 'Y'-- NULLS occur due to contractors
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.costcenter_dim T8 ON T1.Cost_Ctr = T8.CostCenterCode AND T8.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.position_dim T9 ON T1.Position= T9.PositionCode AND T9.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.position_dim TempMPID ON T1.Manager_Position = TempMPID.PositionCode AND TempMPID.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.employee_hr_hierarchy_dim T10 ON T2.EmployeeID = T10.EmployeeID AND T10.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.pins_location_dim T11 ON T1.Loc = T11.LocationCode AND T11.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN (
            SELECT T1.EmployeeID, T1.WorkScheduleID
            FROM odw_harmonised_db.absence_dim T1
            INNER JOIN ( SELECT EmployeeID, Max(AbsenceEndDate) as Max_AbsenceEndDate
                         FROM odw_harmonised_db.absence_dim T1
                         WHERE T1.IsActive = 'Y'
                         GROUP BY EmployeeID ) T3        ON  T1.EmployeeID = T3.EmployeeID AND
                                                             T1.AbsenceEndDate = T3.Max_AbsenceEndDate
            WHERE T1.IsActive = 'Y'
            GROUP BY T1.EmployeeID, T1.WorkScheduleID
            
    ) T12 ON T2.EmployeeID = T12.EmployeeID -- NULLS occur as no data for some employees in the absence file

LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T14 ON "SAP HR" = T14.Description AND T14.IsActive = 'Y'
